description_function: BBS-7 and BBS-8 act to stabilize IFT subcomplex A and B components and join/coordinate the two kinesin motors, OSM-3-kinesin and Kinesin-II

Reference: Murayama et al., 2005; Ou et al., 2005b

description_function: IFT protein of the RAB family; not required for cilium formation
